name: The Legend of Zelda with Boxing Gloves
name_original: The Legend of Zelda with Boxing Gloves
description:
A remake of the first dungeon in The Legend of Zelda. Press the '4' key to play a custom dungeon, in which Link must overcome obstacles, battle new kinds of enemies, and defeat a unique boss with only a pair of boxing gloves!

Controls: 

Arrow Keys/WASD to move

'X' to attack with your sword

'Z' to use your secondary weapon

'SPACE' to cycle through secondary weapons (once you've found some!)

Boxing Gloves Controls:

'X' to punch with your left fist

'Y' to punch with your right fist

Time your punches, build up power, and press 'SPACE' at the right moment to release!
